comment: She's the sweetest professor. Readings were relevant and impactful. Take her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Reading assignments can range from entire books/movies (that you have to buy) to short documents. She is very enthusiastic about the topics and is very nice. Her grading system is fairly easy and hard to fail. The only downside was buying the books/movies($60+). (Don't feel pressured to read the weekly documents or readings fully)
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Group projects

comment: I know other students in my section of the course disagreed, but I personally found the course to be pretty easy. I didn't do most of the reading, but I got an A on both tests because they're open note. Discussion post every week and the final was three lengthy essays. She's really easy to reach by email.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers--Accessible outside class

comment: Seriously disappointed with this professor, online class required EIGHT BOOKS and purchasing outdated documentaries to watch! LONG weekly "letters" with good intentions but unhelpful and unnecessary. She really needs to learn how to teach an online course. Highly recommend taking a different professor if you get impatient with redundant coursework.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Dont let these reviews fool you. This professor is extremely assignment heavy. One and a half weeks to read a 300 page novel. Not only that but be prepared to read and have to pay for a new book almost every week. You would think that with the state of the economy she would be considerate of her students and their budgets, but no. Avoid this class
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Professor Davis is an exceptional teacher and puts a lot of time and care into students needs. The class was very easy if you're willing to write a good bit and she provides a "weekly assignments" folder so you always know what's due and when it's due. One of my favorite professors at KSU.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Inspirational--Caring

comment: I took ENGL 3330 with Dr. Davis and it was one of my favorite classes over the summer. Four required books with discussion posts on each and an essay as the final. Four week semester required a book a week but it was definitely doable if you can sit down and read for hours at a time. Dr. Davis was a very easy grader and gave great feedback on work.

By far the easiest online course I have taken!! All we had to turn in were disscussion boards, and at least two exams as well as a final. She is very caring and understanding, willing to work with you. Interesting lectures and wants you to succeed in the class, take her!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria

comment: I had Dr. Davis for South Asian Lit! Going in, I was kinda hesitant because I'm South Asian and I felt weird about a person who ISN'T South Asian teaching the class, but I definitely feel like she did a great job at letting me express my opinions on the subject matter! I really enjoyed this class, I would take it again if I could!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Davis is very caring and willing to work with you if you are struggling with the class. However, I had to purchase 8 (yes you read that right) books to read over the span of this class. There was a ludicrous amount of reading involved with this course, however if you truly enjoy reading, I would encourage you to take Professor Davis.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Caring

comment: She was very helpful during my first summer semester, and she was organized. She makes sure you are not overwhelmed in her class and will accommodate everyone because she understands we all have a different path. She is an easy grader and few assignments, but don't slack or it will catch up to you :)
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: My class was listed wrong as an 8-week course, but Dr. Davis was incredible in helping us adjust to a 4-week class. She was really caring and genuinely cared about what we had to say and our enjoyment in the subject. Her class had very heavy readings, but that was to be expected. I would love to take one of her classes again.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Hilarious--Caring

comment: She is amazing. She makes the class very interesting.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Easiest class I had to take. She was very easy! Only assignments were discussion posts that were based on books we were reading. They were not too bad. We have tests for each unit but they're online and open note so it's basically an easy A. She is a very caring teacher overall and wants you to learn something from this course. TAKE HER!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I cannot express how much I love this professor. I had to email her to see if she had any more courses because of how amazing she is. I was in the middle of my first exam when the website crashed and underwent maintenance, which gave me a 0. I emailed her and she was so understanding. Not only that, but you can truly tell how much she cares.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Inspirational--Caring

comment: She's an absolute treasure. Super sweet and understanding especially in the time of COVID. There are several texts to read, but they're interesting and you could read a few chapters and still do great. Weekly discussions and quizzes are super easy.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: My favorite. She was so sweet and genuinely made me really like the class. It was clear she wants her students to succeed and enjoy the class. She gives a good bit of reading but is nice about it. Tries to make it easier but still fits a lot of content into one course. Her weekly letters and discussion post-wrap-ups were very useful. Take her!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Inspirational--Caring

comment: this might be the sweetest professor at KSU. yes you have to read a lot, but if you put in the basic effort it is so rewarding. fascinating books and you can tell she gets so happy when the students actually read. she made it feel like she cared about what we had to say and was there for us if we needed it. absolute angel woman
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: This semester was rough because of the Corona Virus but she was so sweet and wanted to know that how we were doing throughout this pandemic. The absolute best professor I've ever had! I wish I had taken more classes with her! There is a lot of reading for this course but it's interesting material and the discussions posts are really easy as well!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Caring

comment: I love this prof. So easy. Discussion posts, online tests after each unit (open notes and she basically gives you the answers in a doc), and a community service project. There were a lot of books to read and movies to watch, but I really enjoyed them. You can get by only reading a few chapters and faking it though. Easy A, great teacher. Take it.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Davis is a rare gem in the world of online teaching. Her approach makes the class feel way more personable than many other professors with her "assignment docs" that are charmingly created as if she were speaking directly to you. Do the reading and be thoughtful in what you write and you'll do great! Lots of reading but very low stress.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Dr. Davis is such a nice lady and really cares about you! Super easy to follow instructions which is rare for online classes. Be prepared to read A LOT though, if you like reading you'll really enjoy her class. There are due dates for discussion posts every week and quizzes about every other week, no biggie if you turn a post in a day late though!
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: Dr. Davis is great at motivating you to do the work despite having a heavy course load (particularly during the summer). She offers an extra credit opportunity, and makes the quizzes fairly easy as long as you read.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--TEST HEAVY

comment: Wonderful professor. I took this class as a filler and enjoyed it. We read 5 books and watched 2 movies on Netflix. Discussion Boards, 2 Tests ,Final, and the Activity project make up your overall grade. She gives plenty of opportunities for extra credit. Read, participate in discussion boards and submit assignments on time and you should get an A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Inspirational--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Awesome professor. Extremely caring and is willing to work with you on deadlines. She knows that you have other classes and tries not to add much workload. She is very passionate about what she teaches. Definitely would take again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Get ready to read

comment: Professor Davis is very nice and really wants her class to succeed. This class consisted of just discussion boards, an activism project, and a couple tests. She makes sure that she does not overload you with work and always gives more than enough time to complete work. She is also not a tough grader at all. As long as you try, you will get an A.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Caring

comment: Took Dr. Davis' class over the summer online - he does an excellent job of laying out the requirements, weekly assignments, & all materials that you'll need! Super organized & wants her students to do well. We read 6 entire books & 2 partial. Discussions and quizzes aren't difficult if you read and participate. Couldn't ask for a better professor!

I took GWST intro online and loved it! Ms. David is very sweet and is always ready to help. All of her lectures were very thought provoking. Get ready to do a bunch of discussion posts thought. I highly recommend this class! Awesome professor!

My minor is in GWST so this is my introductory class and I couldn't have had a better instructor. Dr. Davis is wonderful. You do have lots of reading and discussion posts but its all over  interesting topics.  Tests aren't too hard and you're well prepared with the handouts you are given--even with the final exam.

For the summer, you have to read every day, but the book choice was excellent.  However, she assigns a 5 page mid term paper that you just don't have time to write while you are reading a book and taking book quizzes.  Get rid of the paper and it is a good class.  Discussion posts on books every week also.

Prof Davis was such a sweet teacher. She structured the online class to be as painless as possible. Weekly lectures and directions are very clear. NO PAPERS! BUT there are 8 books to read. 6 full, 2 partial. Quiz on every one. Quizzes are easy if you read and pay attention. 2 tests. Weekly discussion per book. Given ample time to read each book too

Professor Davis is amazing and super easy! I did great in her class and I didn't even read the novels she assigned. All you have to do is skim the books and make sure to pay attention to the overall themes. Also, she was super understanding when I had surgery in the middle of the semester. Take her for an easy A!

She is the best! One of my first online classes and I passed with flying colors. She is easy and respectable. A plus, she made the class super interesting!  Quick to feedback and grading. A lot of books required but discussions are easily do-able. Gives great information and specific expectations. Weekly assignments,two tests. Def. take her!

A very lovely person. Kind of confusing and likely to go off topic. Lets some students dominate the class and talk endlessly about our assignments. She is very open to new ideas and wants to have your imput on how to improve the class. Stressful class that I was excited for at the beginning of the semester and was sadly disappointed.

Absolutely beautifully set up on D2L. You could not ask for a better, straight forward course online. The course work was super easy with weekly discussions. Awesome films to watch and books to read. Highly recommend as a free elective or even chosen as a minor!

Easy and extremely interesting course. Dr. Davis is very friendly, kind, and fair. Weekly discussion posts and open-note/open-book tests. Everyone should take this course in general, but especially with Dr. Davis!

She is (usually) nice. For best grade: write simple, stay inside the box, and don't joke in your write ups. Stick to sunshine, rainbows, and other well established, concrete, autistic-spectrum-friendly concepts. She might go into a prolonged vindictive rage if you write something she doesn't understand D:

Took her online. Did not read a single book and finished with a high B. Participate in the discussions and do all your work & you'll be fine. She is super understanding and is not a hard professor at all. I would take her again! One of the easier online courses I've taken

The best! I kept putting off this class until my friend recommended her to me. I took this class online and I put about 30 minutes of work into it a week. Easy A and I hate reading. To be honest I really did not read. Discussion post are graded on response not length. Quizzes for the 7 or 8 books are easy. Very sweet and understanding.

Took this class online over the summer. Terrible mistake. We had to read 8 novels in eight weeks. WAY too much if you are responsible for other classes that also required a lot of reading. He expectations are unrealistic.

I've said it before and I'll say it again -- quality professor. I took this course as an elective b/c I've had Dr. Davis previously. She's quick to grade and respond to inquiries. Fair grader. She set you up for success. Yes, you will have to read a lot... but this is college, right? Buy the books and read, read, read. She's da bomb!
Good professor. You have to read a lot in the class, but her tests are easy and she is helpful.

TAKE HER!She is AMAZING. She knows wha she is talking about and she makes it interesting. Only downside to taking her courses online, is that you have to spend a lot of money on books! You will in fact use them, so you have to buy them in order to get your grade. But other than that, SHE IS ONE OF THE BEST PROFESSORS I HAVE TAKEN AT KSU!
Dr. Davis is da bomb! She really helps her students suceed. She is has always been very helpful and respectful. Everyone should have Dr. Davis for a class. She really goes out of her way to help you.

Dr. Davis is great! She really tries to connect with her students and cares about what YOU want to learn. She tries her best to help everyone get the grade they want, honestly you'd have to be a total slacker to fail her class. She has a passion for teaching and it shows!

Took this one online. She is a great professor. She is quick to answer emails and offers very specific help. She's so nice that she even apologized and said she hoped she didn't come off as rude... which she so didn't! This class is easy. Just make sure to dedicate a lot of time to it and get creative with your papers. Pay attention to the book too
Took her online class - great class for doing it all at home. Extremely easy if you read the books. Always available to help.

She's very helpful and open to new ideas and concepts. There is a lot of reading but it is a COLLEGE ENGLISH class so if you don't like to read you shouldn't be taking it. She let's you know a week in advance about up and coming projects, test, etc. Class is a democracy not a dictatorship. HIGHLY RECOMMEND HER!!!!
Dr. Davis is great! Very helpful, clear and ethical! She goes out of her way to make sure that everyone understands everything. I would HIGHLY reccomend her!

Highly recommend Dr. Davis. There are four essays for the course and the grade received is not final. She tells you how to get the grade you desire and then turn in the essays at the end of the class for the final, which is the new grade. Very understanding, nice, and genuinely cares about her students. Will take her again if given the chance.

Dr. Davis took over our class after the professor left for health concerns. She's so funny and helpful! She makes research papers not so intimidating and gives us prompts that are actually engaging. She does her best to help out any student who needs it and has such a postivie attitude. Pretty important considering I took her for an 8am class.

ENGLISH IS NOT MY NATIVE LANGUAGE, BUT I GOT B FROM HER CLASS. SHE IS SO NICE, EASY AND REWARD THE GRADE FOR HER STUDENT. I TOOK HER ONLINE CLASS, SHE UNDERSTOOD HER STUDENT, AND ALWAYS CREATE CHANCES TO GIVE THE SCORE FOR HER STUDENT. YOU KNOW, ENGLISH IS BAD ONE FOR ME, BUT AFTER FINISHING HER ONLINE COURSE, I AM SO HAPPY ABOUT MY ENGLISH, AND TH

I LOVE Dr. Davis! This was my first GWST class, and I feel like it literally changed my life. It is an easy class if you like to read (about 1 novel/week) and the content is SO interesting. Grades are mostly discussion board postings. You can tell she has a passion for teaching which gave me the passion to learn :)  TAKE HER!!!!

Dr. Davis was a great professor and she's really smart and caring and honest. I loved her class.  She was always energetic and very helpful. There is a lot of reading but the books are interesting.  You learn a lot but don't think its an easy A..it is easy but you got to work a little bit.  KSU needs more professor likes her!!

Prof. Davis is excellent. I took her online course. She is interested in all of her students doing well. There is a great deal of reading for this type of class, but as long as you do the readings the tests and discussions are very easy. The book choices were great. Most of the books were fairly recent and easy to read. Very easy to receive an A!

I took Dr. Davis for gender and women's studies and it was an online course.She is such a great professor!She is EXTREMELY helpful and understanding and she makes the class SO interesting!She is so sweet and she makes you actually want to learn more. I wish I would've had her in a live classroom to interact more but the online experience was GREAT!

I took this class online because I hate literature.Easy class, interesting books.3 discussion board posts per book, 1 quiz per book, 1 midterm and comprehensive final.All quizzes and tests are open book.She is a great professor.

All I have to say is she is the best teacher I have  had in my college career! This was an online class but absolutely loved her. We met her once and even before then she was so personable! Amazing and if I was not graduating and could take her for another class I would so take her AGAIN!!! I will be getting an A+++!!!

I have never written one of these but she is worthy of a rating! Took her online, she is AWESOME! One of those professors who wants you to succeed!! Will work with you, not against you. Easy A and interesting material so you actually learn too!
Very good Professor. Really enjoyed her online course in World Literature! Very straight to the point on explaining the novels. She's also very helpful and want her students to succeed!

She is great!!! Highly recommend her online classes, you will love it! She is very friendly, helpful and really wants you to do well. I really enjoyed her class and I learnt a lot. I wish all professors at KSU were like her. Tests are easy, just submit everything on time. Take her, you will love her course!!

I LOVE THIS LADY! She is the best professor that I have had at KSU. She is extremely helpful, friendly, and funny. I would highly recommend her. I took her for an online course, and it was very easy. That being said, I learned a lot in this course. Take her!!1

She is amazing! I took her for 8-week 2110 Online and she is just so helpful and wants every student to do well. As long as you actaully read the books you are guaranteed to do well because everything comes straight from the assigned books and she is VERY straighforward about what she expects from you. Best class at KSU yet.

Nicest teacher ever! Very clear and wants her students to succeed. She is a student's teacher. With that said, READ THE BOOKS! There is no way to get around it. If you read the books, you will get an A easily. If not, you will be in that B or C range. The 1st half of the class is hard, but the 2nd half gets easy as the books get shorter. Take Her!

Easiest class I have ever taken, but equally interesting. I learned a lot. Prof Davis is super nice and lenient. I took this course online. Easy A. Read several interesting books, but only had a couple of easy quizzes. Grades were mostly discussion board posts.

This class was super easy. Best English class I've ever had. She gives you time to edit your papers and conference with her, then turn them in at the end of the semester. She's really nice, funny, and understanding. She helped me love writing again, and I improved my writing a lot with this class.
I loved her! She was so helpful and made herself available at all times to help with paper writing. I took her again for 2110 and it was even better. If you can take her, do!

TAKE HER! I took her online Summer 08. All of the reading, 1/2 the time. On average you read about 1 book a week. Lots of discussions and a quiz for every book. It's not all easy but she's AWESOME. She's fair and helpful and you can tell she loves what she does which makes a huge difference.

The nicest teacher I've had at KSU. She was very passionate about GWST and the material was always intresting. She cancelled a few classes so we had more time to prepare. 6-7 online WebCT meetings. This is discussion-based class so you must be comfortable sharing your opinions. 1 group project, 1 oral presentation, 5+ quizzes. Great class!

First of all, she is really funny. She talks to her classes a lot . and not about papers. take her if you can. shes helpful, nice and fun. but you cant miss more than days or a whole letter point gets taken off your grade.

She is definitely an awesome teacher to have. You won't get bored in her class because she usually has a good sense of humor. She is very helpful with essays - can definitely help you improve your writing. She required minimal reading, and your grade is based on a portfolio of 4 essays that you work on throughout the entire semester.

I took her online class this summer, it was so easy. I also had her for ENGL 1101. Read 7 books, it wasnt bad at all. Quizes and tests are very easy. This is my favorite teacher at Kennesaw! Her classes are always booked so good luck! Very helpful and approachable she wants you to do well!
She is a pretty good teacher, but don't miss class to have surgery. If she promises you something, expect her to go back on her word. She also grades papers insanely hard!

Amazing lady, wants you to do well so she does what she can to help you do well. Always available for help when you need it and is willing to help. Very sweet and caring! But her classes are always booked, so good luck!!!!!

This teacher rocked!  I took her online course Fall 2006 and loved it.  She is very clear and there were no papers, only discussions and short essays (a paragraph on how you feel).  Her work took thought, but hey, you're in college now!
Nice lady who will help you with any problems you may have.  She grades papers with an icy cold heart though...

Ok...Ms.Davis is very personable. The class is fun, discussions are great everything seems fine except for the exams!!! She makes you read a whole book & tests only on a random few. The mid-term & finals r brutal! Better have read every book twice b4 the mid-term and final exams. Presentations are an easy 100 plus u get to eat food from different c
This was my second class with Prof Davis, and yet again i LOVED IT!!!!!  she is such an awesome teacher, i HIGHLY recomend her classes
she is so sweet and approachable! She will help you if you are having any sort of problem. I would highly recommend her! I wish I could have her for 1102
She is an excellent teacher and I highly recommend her!  I will definately take her class next semester!
very personable professor, quizzes can be rough, midterm and final require some thought, easy overall class if you can keep up with the reading

Ms. David makes class fun, she really cares about you and your grade. She is willing to work with you about deadlines and she is very understanding.  I HIGHLY recommend her. I am not a big fan of english but she made it a good experience for me.

The teacher is very understanding and willing to work with students with deadlines.  A lot of little assignments keep you from getting behind and allow you to do well on your finished writing assignments.

She is AMAZING! She loves what she does and makes sure you love it too by the time your done in class. Your writing DEFN improves along the way.I didn't like writing until I took her class. She helps you and really wants you to do well.You have to work, but in the end your work pays off. I got an A!

She is fabulous! This is the second class that I have taken with her and she just gets better and better! She will take time out to help you and will make sure that she is clear about everything. She also grades the papers really fast! fall in love with english and take prof. davis!
Easy class. We wrote 3 papers and turned them all in at the end of the semester. She's funny and cool. I hated English in high school but this class was actually enjoyable.
Awesome professor. She loves what she does. There is a lot of reading in this class, but it is actually interesting stuff. I definitley recommend taking this teacher. She is wonderful!

She is a very nice lady but that is not a case b/c she doesn't teach you at all and no matter how good your paper was she give you a low grade.Befor i turn in my paper i gave it to 3 other professor and they all loved it but she told me that's an OK paper

She is a very good teacher.She makes sure that you understand how she grades and she even helps you redraft your paper. Just make sure you show up to every class, she gives points that will help you get a B or higher!
Very nice teacher.Attendance is important if u want an A.
she is a really good teacher. get her, you won't regret it. VERY easy class even if you suck at english.
Very good professor.  Loves what she teaches and it shows through her efforts.
awesome teacher, very helpful and very nice, willing to go the extra mile so you can get a better grade, will let you redo things
easy teacher, helpful, funny, knows we all have lives outside of school and tries to work around that with us
Easy class.  Wrote 4 papers and she grades three of them.  Class attendance necessary but the entire class gets to skip on certain days.  Great teacher, and she is really nice.
Really good prof., easy, helpful...
Very good teacher who loves the topic.
She's a VERY nice English teacher, always willing to help you out.  Grades very fairly.
Extremely helpful.  Wants all students to be succesaful.
She's the best english prof ever...she also likes to eat alot!
